function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Insufficient assessment of the effectiveness of UVGI systems in mitigating the spread of contagious diseases in healthcare settings","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"No rules for periodically monitoring indoor air quality in a facility.","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Focus on healthcare facilities and educational buildings increases the risk of virus transmission in these high-traffic areas.","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Transmission of virus from infected individuals to the community due to quarantine facility leakage","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Global threat from respiratory viruses such as sars, sars-cov-2, influenza, and tuberculosis tb .","category":"Person","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential psychological burdens and societal harms from harsh npis and lockdowns.","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Quarantine failures leading to indoor infection in existing buildings.","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Government not effectively communicating risk","category":"Leadership","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Uncertain and unexpected outcomes","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Public’s lack of understanding of professional knowledge about risks","category":"Participation","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Public seeking unproven information or rumors due to uncertainty","category":"Participation","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Concealment of information by governments","category":"Accountability","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate and inaccurate information disclosure from the government to the public","category":"Accountability","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Challenges in deciding what information to disclose to the public","category":"Accountability","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited effectiveness of government decision-making on risk governance","category":"Laws&Regulations","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Silencing and punishing of 'rumormongers' during the initial outbreak of an unknown disease","category":"Laws&Regulations","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reluctant information disclosure leading to public’s ignorance of self-protection","category":"Accountability","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Politics being the most important issue restricting the voice of the academic community","category":"Leadership","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Ambiguous information about outbreak handling by the government","category":"Leadership","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Government concealing information about the outbreak","category":"Accountability","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Ambiguity in government communication","category":"Leadership","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of timely warning to the public about the outbreak","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Government decision making based on political interests and social stability rather than public health","category":"Leadership","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Delay in government control measures due to balancing political, stability, and economic factors","category":"Leadership","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of scientific risk communication in decision making","category":"Laws&Regulations","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Limited government information dissemination","category":"Leadership","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of information transparency during the initial phase of an outbreak","category":"Accountability","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Delayed decision making and information disclosure during the early stages of an outbreak","category":"Leadership","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Neglect of waste management as an urgent public service","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Neglect of environmental impact of the epidemic","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Repeal of disposable bag bans leading to an increase in single-use plastic waste","category":"Laws&Regulations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Clean beaches due to lack of tourists","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Need for comprehensive health education program related to covid-19 prevention and control","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Low representation of women in the study may skew the results and impact the generalizability of findings.","category":"Participation","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of social networking apps for data collection and distribution.","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of adequate knowledge and prevention practice related to covid-19","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate health protocols and measures taken by the government","category":"Leadership","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Attention of countries focused on critical intervention for pandemic prevention and mitigation","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Rapid global outbreak of covid-19","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of knowledge and attitude on covid-19 promotion and prevention","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Predicted increase in cases without vaccine availability","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited funding for Development","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inability to identify silent infections without symptoms","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Networking security systems with facial recognition software to trace contacts of infected individuals may pose privacy risks and potential misuse of personal data.","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact of strategies","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential contamination during RNA extraction process","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"}]}
